article_title: Closing of Kansas hospital adds to Medicaid expansion debate
article_text:
Many factors doomed Mercy Hospital, the only hospital in Independence, Kan.

State expansion of Medicaid would have helped Mercy, but it may not have saved it

Now more residents will rely on a hospital 40 miles away in Oklahoma

article_metadata.title: Closing of Kansas hospital adds to Medicaid expansion debate | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Mercy Hospital shut its doors for good this month, leaving the 9,500 residents of Independence, Kan., unsure who their doctors will be or where those residents will go in a medical emergency. Some wonder if Medicaid expansion might have helped save the hospital.
